Toast.LeftError: Unfortunately you could not leave the room because of a error!

Player.Title: Players
Player.RejoinAlert: Send {{names}} the code {{roomCode}} or link {{link}} so he can join again.
Player.KickMessage: Do you really want to kick {{name}}?

Stop.Message: Do you really want to end the game?

Join.Subheader: Select avatar, insert your name and hit Start now
Join.Name: Insert name
Join.Error: The game is already in progress or the name is already taken! Contact the game admin for more information.
Join.Not Exist Text: The room does not exist anymore

Lobby.Waiting: We are just waiting for new players to join and the admin to start the game!
Lobby.Join: To allow other players to join, provide them with the following link or code:
Lobby.CopyFailed: We could not copy anything to your clipboard!
Lobby.StartPlayerDisconnected: The game can not be started until all players are connected. Wait for {{names}} or kick them to start the game!

About.Title: Imprint
About.PreText: Information according to ยง 5 TMG
About.PostText: Please contact me only with justified interest!

Error.Text: If you were looking for a Mapinguari - here it is not!
